abstract: Iranian grandmaster Ehsan Ghaem Maghami is expelled from the Corsica Masters chess tournament after refusing to play a match against Israeli opponent Ehud Shachar.
snippet: Ehsan Ghaem Maghami, an Iranian, refused to compete against Ehud Shachar, an Israeli, in the fourth round of the Corsica Masters.
lead_paragraph: Ehsan Ghaem Maghami, an Iranian, refused to compete against Ehud Shachar, an Israeli, in the fourth round of the Corsica Masters.

headline.main: Iranian, Refusing to Play Israeli, Expelled From Chess Meet
headline.seo: Maghami Expelled From Corsica Chess Meet
